title: Touch the Sun : Princess Kate (K)

description: Episode of Series 'Touch the Sun'. Thirteen year old Kate's world is turned tospy turvy when she learns she is adopted. Unaware of the pain she is causing her adoptive family, Kate searches for her "real" parents. Her unexpected arrival on the doorstep of her natural mother stirs up mixed emotions. Kate succeeds in befriending her half-sister May before returning home to her adoptive parents with a new understanding of herself and her relationships. Cast includes Justine Clark, Lyndel Rowe, Alan Cassel, Myra Noblet, Shane Tickner, Rebeh Elmalog Lou, Lorna Lesley, Martin Sacks, Mouche Phillips, Claudia Karvan, Beth Buchanan. Written by Kristin and David Williamson.
